channel.title: CheckPointDone!
channel.itunes:summary:
CheckPointDone! podcast with hosts @D5120 and @foxhouder01. A general chat about video games, tv, movies, comics and all things geeky.
Feel free to get in contact by twitter @checkpointdone, via email checkpointdonepodcast@gmail.com or pop to the site checkpointdone.com

item.title: Episode 100 | Ode To Darren
item.description: Hello, and welcome to episode 100 of the CheckPointDone! Podcast! In this episode Darren talks about his week off work, office moves, decorating, hanging with the parents and festivals…Meanwhile, Terry talks MCM Comic Con, his week off work, new toys
item.content:encoded:
Hello, and welcome to episode 100 of the CheckPointDone! Podcast!

In this episode Darren talks about his week off work, office moves, decorating, hanging with the parents and festivals…Meanwhile, Terry talks MCM Comic Con, his week off work, new toys and weight loss in ‘Stuff we’ve done’.

We talk spoiler free about games such as Detroit: Become Human, Middle Earth: Shadow of War, DC Universe Online, Blazing Chrome, Apex Legends, Moonlighter and Super Mario Maker 2 in ‘What we’ve played’.

We discuss the various films and TV including: Sopranos, Shazam!, Hellboy, Dumbo, Fargo, Happy!, Big Little Lies, The Boys, Another Life, Tron Legacy, Euphoria and The OA. Then, Terry and Darren discuss the movie challenge, this time it’s Adventures in Babysitting in ‘What we’ve watched’.

In ‘What we’ve read’ we discuss The Kurupt FM Podkast, The Forever Part 2 and motivational books. Then we take a trip into The Reading Corner as we discuss ‘Ghostbusters International’.

As always thank you very much for listening! If you would like to give us a review we would really appreciate that. Give us a review on your podcast service of choice and let us know! We are available on major podcast services including: iTunes, Sticher and Spotify!

If you would like to send us an email it’s checkpointdonepodcast@gmail.com

You can follow us on twitter: @checkpointdone

Check us out over on Facebook, search for ‘Check Point Done’

You can subscribe to us over on Youtube channel

If you would like to get in touch with us on our personal twitters, Darren is @D5120 and Terry is @foxhounder01

Hello, and welcome to episode 99 of the CheckPointDone! Podcast.

In this episode Darren talks about healthy stuff, bike stuff, buying a GoPro, mesh stuff and walking kittens?…Meanwhile, Terry talks not doing much in ‘Stuff we’ve done’.

Terry talks spoiler free about games such as Apex Legends, Fortnite, Shadow Warriors 2 and some other random stuff in ‘What we’ve played’.

We discuss the various films and TV including: Sopranos, Euphoria, Impractical Jokers and Shaft. Then, Terry and Darren discuss the movie challenge, this time it’s Fargo in ‘What we’ve watched’.

In ‘What we’ve read’ we discuss Endure: Mind, Body and the Curiously Elastic Limits of Human Performance and Positively Unstoppable. Then we take a trip into The Reading Corner as we discuss ‘Ghostbusters International’.

item.title: Episode 98 | Euphoric
item.description: Hello, and welcome to episode 98 of the CheckPointDone! Podcast. In this episode Darren talks about healthy stuff, going on an adventure stag do and picking up a “cheap” mountain bike. Meanwhile, Terry talks about visiting Sheffield and going to play
item.content:encoded:
Hello, and welcome to episode 98 of the CheckPointDone! Podcast.

In this episode Darren talks about healthy stuff, going on an adventure stag do and picking up a “cheap” mountain bike. Meanwhile, Terry talks about visiting Sheffield and going to play video games in an arcade in ‘Stuff we’ve done’.

Terry talks spoiler free about games such as Stranger Things 3 The Game and My Time At Portia in ‘What we’ve played’.

We discuss the various films and TV including: Alita: Battle Angel, Sopranos, Spider-Man: Far From Home, Stranger Things 3 and Euphoria. Then, Terry and Darren discuss the movie challenge, this time it’s Dogma in ‘What we’ve watched’.

In ‘What we’ve read’ we discuss Endure: Mind, Body and the Curiously Elastic Limits of Human Performance and Fatman Beyond. Then we take a trip into The Reading Corner as we discuss ‘Ghostbusters International09’.

As always thank you very much for listening! If you would like to give us a review we would really appreciate that. Give us a review on your podcast service of choice and let us know! We are available on major podcast services including: iTunes, Sticher and Spotify!

item.title: Episode 97 | Brilliantly Bad
item.description: Hello, and welcome to episode 97 of the CheckPointDone! Podcast. In this episode Darren talks about landscaping, visiting parents and even more kitten adventures. Meanwhile, Terry talks about the National Videogame Museum in ‘Stuff we’ve done’. We talk spoiler free about
item.content:encoded:
Hello, and welcome to episode 97 of the CheckPointDone! Podcast.

In this episode Darren talks about landscaping, visiting parents and even more kitten adventures. Meanwhile, Terry talks about the National Videogame Museum in ‘Stuff we’ve done’.

We talk spoiler free about games including: Borderlands 2, Battlefield V, random retro games and Witcher 3 in ‘What we’ve played’.

We discuss the various films and TV including: Captain Marvel, Spider-Man, Gantz:0, The Order, Black Mirror, Love, Death + Robot, Good Omens, Big Little Lies, John Wick 2, Terminator, Bob Lazar: Area 51 & Flying Saucers, The Crystal Maze and Trinkets. Then, Terry and Darren discuss the movie challenge, this time it’s Nightmare on Elm Street 2: Freddy’s Revenge in ‘What we’ve watched’.

In ‘What we’ve read’ we discuss a variety of books and podcasts that we’ve consumed with our face ears. Then we take a trip into The Reading Corner as we discuss ‘Oblivion Song’.

As always thank you very much for listening! If you would like to give us a review we would really appreciate that. Give us a review on your podcast service of choice and let us know! We are available on major podcast services including: iTunes, Sticher and Spotify!

item.content:encoded:

In this episode Darren talks his week off, his radioactive cat and his fancy new washer. Meanwhile, Terry talks being able to breathe again and Free Comic Book Day in ‘Stuff we’ve done’.

We talk spoiler free about games including: Crackdown, Doom, Witcher 3, Borderlands, Borderlands 2, World War Z, Fortnite: Endgame and Minecraft in ‘What we’ve played’.

We discuss the various films and TV including: Bumblebee, Iron Sky: The Coming Race. Bosch, The Disappearance of Madaline McCann, Avengers Age of Ultron, Avengers Endgame, Snowpiercer, Chambers and You. Then, Terry and Darren discuss the movie challenge, this time it’s Heathers in ‘What we’ve watched’.

In ‘What we’ve read’ we discuss a little Dresden, Tribe, How to be a Man, music and podcasts. Then we take a trip into The Reading Corner as we discuss the comic series 100 Bullets.

We talk spoiler free about games including: Assassin’s Creed Rogue, Sky Force Reloaded, Trials Rising, Apex Legends, Crackdown 3 and Metro Exodus in ‘What we’ve played’.

In ‘What we’ve read’ we discuss Comedy Club, Fear the Future and Stranger Things: Suspicious Minds. Then we take a trip into The Reading Corner as we discuss the comic series Battle Angel Alita.

In this episode Darren discusses his week off, real life stuff, man tools and a going to a local beer festival and Terry talks about exercise things and going from an XL sized man to a L sized person in ‘Stuff we’ve done’.

We talk spoiler free about games including: Gears of War 4, Mario & Rabbids Kingdom Battle, The Turing Test, Knack, Titanfall 2, PSVR stuff, Battlefield 1, ePicross 8, Microsoft Solitaire and Shadow of the Colossus in ‘What we’ve played’.

We discuss the various films and TV including: Blade Runner 2049, Gotham by Gaslight, Saw: The Final Chapter, Geostorm, Star Wars: The Last Jedi, Glitch, Black Lightning, Beyond, Grand Tour, SAS and Altered Carbon. Then, Terry talks about his challenge, this time is the 1990s IT in ‘What we’ve watched’.

In ‘What we’ve read’ we discuss audiobooks/podcasts and stuff with Dresden Files: Death Mask, Nomad, A Gift of Time, Dresden Files: Fool Moon and Grave Peril. Then we take a trip into The Reading Corner as we discuss the comic series Motor Crush.

As always thank you for listening! Feel free to get in contact by twitter @checkpointdone, via email checkpointdonepodcast@gmail.com. Like what you hear? Leave us an iTunes review, or why not pop onto the website at checkpointdone.com

item.title: Episode 57 | Darren Made Santa’s Naughty List
item.description: Welcome to episode 57 of the CheckPointDone! Podcast and the last episode of 2017! In this episode, Darren discusses doing family and chilling out. Terry gets ill and talks about Christmas things in ‘Stuff we’ve done’. In ‘Facepalm’ Darren complains about
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to episode 57 of the CheckPointDone! Podcast and the last episode of 2017!

In this episode, Darren discusses doing family and chilling out. Terry gets ill and talks about Christmas things in ‘Stuff we’ve done’.

In ‘Facepalm’ Darren complains about phone walkers and Terry talks about the DrDisrespect controversy.

We talk spoiler free about games including: Super Mario Odyssey, South Park: Fractured But Whole, Mario Kart 8, Pinball FX 3, Recore, Zelda: Breath of the Wild Playerunknown’s Battlegrounds, Counter Spy and Amazing Katamari Damacy in ‘What we’ve played’.

We discuss the various films and TV including: Dark Tower, Atomic Blonde, Final Recall, Beyond Skyfall, Logan Lucky, The Orville, Marvel’s Runaways, Philip K. Dick’s Electric Dreams, Blue Planet 2,  Scott Pilgrim Vs The World, Kick Ass, Star Wars: The Last Jedi, Popstars: Never Stop Never Stopping, The Night Before, Elf and Bate’s Motel. Terry talks about his challenge, this time around it’s Convoy in ‘What we’ve watched’.

In ‘What we’ve read’ we discuss audiobooks/podcasts and stuff with lots and lots of The Lonely Island and Artemis. Then we take a trip into The Reading Corner as we discuss the comic series Ghostbusters x TMNT.

As well as the above we discuss our picks of the year and look back at some of the best that 2017 had to offer.

As always thank you for listening! Feel free to get in contact by twitter @checkpointdone, via email checkpointdonepodcast@gmail.com. Like what you hear? Leave us an iTunes review, or why not pop onto the website at checkpointdone.com

See you in 2018!

Welcome to episode 52 of the CheckPointDone! Podcast. In this episode, Darren talks about the Goose Fair, riding public transport, more Five Guys, meeting up with fellow podcast folks, and a well deserved apology. Meanwhile, Terry talks about dropping his jeans…sizes, Strava, Couch to 5k, walking in the rain, raw nips and his terrifying Go Ape experience in ‘Stuff we’ve done’.

In ‘Facepalm’ we discuss iOS and it’s ability to ruin ring tones.

We talk spoiler free about games including: Fallout 4, Agents of Mayhem, Sky Force Anniversary, The Witness and Stranger Things The Game in ‘What we’ve played’.

We discuss the various films and TV including: Fast and the Furious 8, The Mummy, X-Files, The Gifted, Lucifer, Robocop, Long Shot, Paper Towns and 13 Reasons Why. Finally, Terry talks about his challenge, this time around it’s Silent Running in ‘What we’ve watched’.

Finally, we discuss audiobooks/podcasts and stuff with The Last Coyote, Trunk Music, Convicted podcast and some geeky Metal music with Erock. Finally, we visit ‘The Reading Corner’ as we discuss the comic series Judge Dredd: Year One.

Finally, Terry talks about his challenge, this time around it’s Twelve Monkeys in ‘What we’ve watched’.

item.content:encoded:
Welcome to episode 47 of the CheckPointDone! Podcast. In this episode, Darren talks about more bathroom stuff, and adventures at Splendor and YNot Festivals. Meanwhile, Terry talks about motorway driving, Manchester MCM Comic Con and an encounter with Solid Snake in ‘Stuff we’ve done’.

In ‘Facepalm’ we discuss Darren’s confusion about reaction videos on YouTube and Terry is upset about game sites releasing cutscenes months in advance of their release.

We talk spoiler free about games including: Assassin’s Creed: Syndicate, The Final Station, Super Sanctum TD and Homeworld: Deserts of Kharak in ‘What we’ve played’.

We discuss the various films and TV including: Ghost in the Shell, Boss Baby, Saban’s Power Rangers, Stargate, Bates Motel, Glow and SDCC. Finally, Terry talks about his challenge, this time around it’s Stand By Me in ‘What we’ve watched’.

Finally, we discuss audiobooks/podcasts and stuff with Fear the Survivors, a sprinkle of Ready Player One as well as music stuff. Finally, we visit ‘The Reading Corner’ as we discuss the comic series Ex Machina.

As always thank you for listening! Feel free to get in contact by twitter @checkpointdone, via email checkpointdonepodcast@gmail.com. Like what you hear? Leave us an iTunes review, or why not pop onto the website at checkpointdone.com

In ‘Facepalm’ we discuss the Forza 7 debacle as well as Sony hating Minecraft fans.

We talk spoiler free about games including: Mass Effect: Andromeda, Overwatch, Uncharted 4, Wipeout Omega, Neir Automata, Neon Chrome, Wolfenstein: The Old Blood as well as our faves from E3 2017 in ‘What we’ve played’.

Finally, Terry talks about his challenge in the form of the movie What we do in the Shadows in ‘What we’ve watched’.

item.description: Welcome to episode 33 of the CheckPointDone! Podcast. In this episode, Darren talks about having manflu, the death of D5120.com and recording the podcast from hell! Also, Terry talks about his driving test being cancelled and getting excited over rather mundane
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to episode 33 of the CheckPointDone! Podcast. In this episode, Darren talks about having manflu, the death of D5120.com and recording the podcast from hell! Also, Terry talks about his driving test being cancelled and getting excited over rather mundane purchases in ‘Stuff we’ve done’.

We talk spoiler free about a whole load of games including: Sunset Overdrive, Peggle 2, Infamous First Light, Telltales’ Back to the Future, Unfinished Swan, World of Van Helsing: Deathtrap, The Deadly Tower of Monsters, Starcraft 2, Resident Evil 4, Super Mario Run, Alien Isolation, Solitairica, Pokémon Go as well as our thoughts about the Nintendo Switch presentation in ‘What we’ve played’.

We discuss the various films and TV including: Pete’s Dragon, Nine Lives, Frequency, American Horror Story, Sherlock, wrestling and The Crystal Maze. Finally, Terry talks about his challenge in the form of the movie Big Trouble in Little Chine in ‘What we’ve watched’.

Finally, we discuss the audiobooks/podcasts and stuff including: The Long Way to a Small, Angry Planet, Preacher, Powers, Alien: Out of the Shadow and Justice League/Power Ranger in ‘What we’ve read’. Finally, we visit ‘The Reading Corner’ and read the comic series Chew.

As always, feel free to get in contact by twitter @checkpointdone, via email checkpointdonepodcast@gmail.com. Like what you hear? Leave us an iTunes review, or why not pop onto the website at checkpointdone.com

Happy 2017 everybody!

In this episode, Darren talks about drinking lots, being sociable, playing with his camera and fancy telescope. Also, Terry talks about Christmas related things in ‘Stuff we’ve done’.

We talk spoiler free about a whole load of games including: Assassins Creed IV Black Flag, The Stanley Parable, Sunset Overdrive, Starcraft 3: Legacy of the Void, DOOM, Resident Evil 4 and The Last Guardian in ‘What we’ve played’.

Finally, we discuss the audiobooks/podcasts and stuff including: …Well, not much really in ‘What we’ve read’.

item.content:encoded:
MERRY CHRISTMAS EVERYONE!

In this episode, Darren talks about Christmas dos, home automation, podcast editing, his third midlife crisis purchase. Also, Terry talks Christmas stuff in ‘Stuff we’ve done’.

We talk spoiler free about a whole load of games including: Microsoft Solitaire Collection, Telltale’s Batman, Picross 3D Round 2, Super Mario Run, Watch Dogs 2, Mass Effect, Mass Effect 2 (!), Hitman as well as gaming buying habits and 2017’s most wanted in ‘What we’ve played’.

We discuss the various films and TV including: Spectral, Expanse, Van Helsing, Jingle All The Way, The Goonies and Big Bang Theory. Finally, Terry talks about his challenge in the form of the TV show Ashes to Ashes in ‘What we’ve watched’.

Finally, we discuss the audiobooks/podcasts and stuff including: Star Wars: Catalyst The Long Way to a Small, Angry Planet: Wayfarers 1. We take a trip into ‘The Reading Corner’ as we discuss the comic series Sex Criminals in ‘What we’ve read’.

item.content:encoded:
In this episode, Darren talks about fighting off a cold, his green screen work, recording with the ScutterCast crew, works Christmas do, work woes, home automation, Google Cardboard and his excitement for a new supermarket! Also, Terry talks about his 3 day weekend and Christmas decorating in ‘Stuff we’ve done’.

We talk spoiler free about a whole load of games including: Microsoft Solitaire Collection, Batman, Assassins Creed Black Flag, Uncharted 4, Watch_Dogs 2 and the PlayStation VR in ‘What we’ve played’.

We discuss the various films and TV including: Finding Dory, Expanse, Westworld, Broken Skull Challenge, PSX Experience. Finally, Terry talks about his challenge in the form of the movie Life on Mars in ‘What we’ve watched’.

SPOILER ALERT! We talk all kinds of spoilers about Suicide Squad. Spoilers Start here: 33:30 and End here: 42:20.

Finally, we discuss the audiobooks/podcasts including: Star Wars: Catalyst and The Death of WCW. We take a trip into ‘The Reading Corner’ as we discuss the comic series Night of the Living Deadpool in ‘What we’ve read’.

We talk spoiler free about a whole load of games including: Assassins Creed Black Flag, Medal of Honor: Warfighter, Super Mega Baseball, Recore, Earthlock: Festival of Magic, Destiny, GTA Vice City, Mad Riders, From Dust, Mass Effect, Hitman, The Bunker and Bioshock in ‘What we’ve played’.

Finally, we discuss the audiobooks/podcasts including: NPC’s, The Black Echo and The Scuttercast. We take a trip into ‘The Reading Corner’ as we discuss the comic series Bluntman and Chronic in ‘What we’ve read’.

item.title: Episode 23 | Sausage Fest
item.description: In this episode, Darren discusses why he wasn’t able to do Tough Mudder and his adventures at the Sausage & Cider Festival in ‘Stuff we’ve done’. We talk spoiler free about a whole load of games including: Far Cry 4, Ultron, Uncharted, Batman
item.content:encoded:
In this episode, Darren discusses why he wasn’t able to do Tough Mudder and his adventures at the Sausage & Cider Festival in ‘Stuff we’ve done’.

We talk spoiler free about a whole load of games including: Far Cry 4, Ultron, Uncharted, Batman A Telltale Series (episode 1), Bioshock 2, Rebel Galaxy, Killzone Mercenary, the Titanfall Pre-Alpha Test, Mass Effect, Deus Ex GO, Deus Ex: Mankind Divided and Hitman in ‘What we’ve played’.

We discuss the various films and TV including: The Revenant, The Last Dragon, Midnight Special, Limitless, Mr Robot, The Tick, Legends, Wasted and yes, Stranger Things…AGAIN! In the challenge section we talk about Commando in ‘What we’ve watched’.

Finally, we discuss the audiobooks/podcasts including: Armada. We go into ‘The Reading Corner’ as we discuss the comic series Spectrum in ‘What we’ve read’.

Many thanks goes out to Stu Cullen (@FuryAc3) for featuring us in the Scottish Sun!

 

As always, feel free to get in contact by twitter @checkpointdone, via email checkpointdonepodcast@gmail.com. Like what you hear? Leave us an iTunes review, or why not pop onto the website at checkpointdone.com

item.description: In this episode, we discuss Darren’s evening of culture with Cats, family time and increasing amount of game time. Also, Terry gives the results of his driving test and exercise(?!) in ‘Stuff we’ve done’. We talk spoiler free about a whole
item.content:encoded:
In this episode, we discuss Darren’s evening of culture with Cats, family time and increasing amount of game time. Also, Terry gives the results of his driving test and exercise(?!) in ‘Stuff we’ve done’.

We talk spoiler free about a whole load of games including: Far Cry 4, Ultron, No Man’s Sky and Hitman in ‘What we’ve played’.

We discuss the various films and TV including: Hardcore Henry, 10 Cloverfield Lane, Batman: The Killing Joke, Suicide Squad, The Do-Over, Ash vs Evil Dead, Preacher, Scream and Impractical Jokers UK. In the challenge section we talk about Blue Thunder in ‘What we’ve watched’.

Finally, we discuss the audiobooks/podcasts including: Back to the Future and Undisclosed podcast Season 2. We go into ‘The Reading Corner’ as we discuss the comic series Saga in ‘What we’ve read’.

Many thanks to Matthew Royal for ‘The Reading Corner’ music! I will add your Soundcloud profile as soon as I get it from you!
